entry.title: The Secret Origins of 420: Unraveling the Mysteries of Cannabis Culture’s Biggest Day
entry.summary: Discover the true story behind 420, the iconic day celebrated by cannabis enthusiasts around the world. From its intriguing counterculture origins to its role in cannabis advocacy and legalization, explore how 420 became a global phenomenon. Learn about safe consumption, the impact of legalization, and how you can join the festivities!

entry.title: The Benefits & Uses of Terpineol
entry.summary: Discover the many benefits and uses of Terpineol, a naturally occurring compound found in a variety of plants. Learn how it can be used to improve your health and wellbeing.

entry.title: What’s it Feel Like to be High on Weed?
entry.summary: From the effects to the experience, discover what it's really like to be high on weed. Learn about the sensations, benefits, and risks associated with marijuana use.

entry.title: How Long Will Magic Shrooms Last?
entry.summary: Discover the shelf life of magic mushrooms, and learn how to store them properly for maximum freshness. Find out how long your shrooms will last!

entry.title: The Battle for Marijuana Legalization in Oklahoma: Why Voters Ultimately Said ‘No’
entry.summary: Last week, 63 percent of Oklahoma voters said no to a proposal that would have allowed recreational marijuana use for people over 21. This means that the recreational use of marijuana is still not legal in Oklahoma, even though the state has already approved over 2,800 medical marijuana licenses.
